alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 3:18PM EST until December 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central Indiana, west central, central, south central, and southwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and quickly changing visibilities which could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will diminish early this evening. Some scattered snow squalls will be possible during the remaining daylight hours, leading to rapidly changing visibilities and hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iln as well as on our Facebook and X pages.
